Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Thrust reverser deployment delay. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Engine Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
